001package reciprocal.linear.matrix;
002
003import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import java.io.Serial;
007import java.io.Serializable;
008import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
009
010/**
011 * Entry for matrices
012 *
013 * @param <E> element
014 * @param rowIndex row index
015 * @param columnIndex column index
016 * @param element element
017 * @since 0.0.1
018 */
019public record MatrixEntry<E extends Number>(int rowIndex, int columnIndex, @NotNull E element) implements Serializable {
020    @Serial
021    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
022
023    /**
024     * Constructor
025     *
026     * @param rowIndex row index
027     * @param columnIndex column index
028     * @param element element
029     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code rowIndex <= 0}
030     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code columnIndex <= 0}
031     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code element == null}
032     * @since 0.0.1
033     */
034    public MatrixEntry {
035        checkArgument(rowIndex > 0, "rowIndex > 0 expected but rowIndex = %s", rowIndex);
036        checkArgument(columnIndex > 0, "columnIndex > 0 expected but columnIndex = %s", columnIndex);
037        requireNonNull(element, "element");
038    }
039
040    /**
041     * Returns a copy with new row index
042     *
043     * @param newRowIndex row index
044     * @return copy
045     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code newIndex < 1}
046     * @since 0.0.1
047     */
048    public @NotNull MatrixEntry<@NotNull E> withRowIndex(final int newRowIndex) {
049        checkArgument(newRowIndex > 0, "newRowIndex > 0 expected but newRowIndex = %s", newRowIndex);
050        return new MatrixEntry<>(newRowIndex, columnIndex, element);
051    }
052
053    /**
054     * Returns a copy with new column index
055     *
056     * @param newColumnIndex column index
057     * @return copy
058     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code newColumnIndex < 1}
059     * @since 0.0.1
060     */
061    public @NotNull MatrixEntry<@NotNull E> withColumnIndex(final int newColumnIndex) {
062        checkArgument(newColumnIndex > 0, "newColumnIndex > 0 expected but newColumnIndex = %s", newColumnIndex);
063        return new MatrixEntry<>(rowIndex, newColumnIndex, element);
064    }
065
066    /**
067     * Returns a copy with new element
068     *
069     * @param newElement element
070     * @return copy
071     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code newElement == null}
072     * @since 0.0.1
073     */
074    public @NotNull MatrixEntry<@NotNull E> withElement(final @NotNull E newElement) {
075        requireNonNull(newElement, "newElement");
076        return new MatrixEntry<>(rowIndex, columnIndex, newElement);
077    }
078}
